title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: There is a line in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil that uses Class.forName() to create a new instance of Callback class.
EB: The line of code in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil that uses Class.forName() should be modified to use direct instantiation of the Callback class instead of reflection.
SR:
To reproduce this bug:
1. Open the org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil file.
2. Look for the line that uses Class.forName().
3. Modify the code to use direct instantiation of the Callback class.
4. Save the file and recompile the application.
5. Verify that the NoClassDefFoundError is no longer thrown.
